price: Allah yang memiliki segala apa yang di langit dan di bumi.  Dan celakalah bagi orang-orang kafir karena siksaan yang sangat pedih.
arabic: ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ مِنۡ عَذَابٖ شَدِيدٍ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahi alladhī lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wawaylun lil'kāfirīna min ʿadhābin shadīdin
